meanings.definition: A woman who engages in promiscuous or illicit sexual relations.
meanings.sent1: The town was shocked to discover a group of cyprians living on the outskirts.

meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the struggles faced by cyprians in society.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to prostitutes or prostitution.
